description: Second column of Lucas bisection triangle (even part).
comments: Numerator of g.f. is row polynomial sum(A061186(2,m)*x^m,m=0..3).
references: É. Czabarka, R. Flórez, L. Junes, A Discrete Convolution on the Generalized Hosoya Triangle, Journal of Integer Sequences, 18 (2015), #15.1.6.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
